text:
lt Soft Tissue Sarcoma Treatment for information on treatment in adults.)
							                
							                  
							                    There are many different types of soft tissue sarcomas.
							                    The cells of each type of sarcoma look different under a microscope. The soft tissue tumors are grouped based on the type of soft tissue cell where they first formed.    This summary is about the following types of soft tissue sarcoma:     Fat tissue tumors
